sentence: However all that shines on the exterior does not shine on the inside as the service is utterly atrocious
Nothings been too much trouble for the staff everyone has been super helpful
Although as one expects staff change but the level of service remains constant at an extremely high level

This even included room service breakfast at 6 am on our day of departureWe had breakfast each morning in the Executive Lounge and it was fantastic each morning we were welcomed by An who knew us by name and what we wanted to drink without having to ask
The only thing that had not been done that I had requested was for the alcohol to be cleared from the fridge but a quick call to reception and this was sorted out pronto
The security was bad as some of the receptionists gave my information for people which I do not know
the food is way overpriced by world standards but it was all high quality and service excellent
At 1530 as nobody called we went to the desk to be told to have a tea and continue to wait as the room was not yet ready the hotel has more than 500 rooms and was not full
I was informed by the really unhelpful club team representative that this would have to be billed as room service
Also rude staff at the lobby cafe

We spoke to our Travel Agents who were as useful as a chocolate teapot when you asked them to do some work rather than just take your money and ended up contacting the hotel manager directly who was excellent in speed of response and assured us it would be ok and it would just be decorationalWhen we turned up that was not entirely the case and the hotel response was excellent service was top clasAs for the hotel it was as good as we remembered it from 6 years before
The buggy service interconnecting ehole jumeirah area was an additional advantage
Having arriving here five days ago what a hotel beach staff everything about it they can not do enough for you

Best hotel for families everything was spectacular but not the best breakfast in Dubai in latitude restaurant however beachcombers is much better refurbished rooms are beautiful and babysitting service is professional and reliable
From the manager ’s right down to floor level we were stunned with the service
A multitude of pools water fountain s good service and the ever essential shaded areas to hide from the relentless heat

Perfect for Families with small Kids we have discovered the kidsclub a bit late would have been nice if the staff draws our Attention to it they only advertised Wild Wadi which was ok nothing special compared to other aquaparks
The staff brought in two extra beds for the children that were comfortable not like the regular sofa beds that you usually get

I have wanted to stay here for a while although we have been in the bars and restaurants before well this March I finally made it and I am guted that I waited so long to stay its perfectionMost hotels in Dubai look good and have good service but this hotel exceeds them all on amenities and most of all service we had a wonderful experience and they made my birthday a very special day
The place is nice but service is not that what I have expected from a 5 star Resort
Staff were friendly and helpful both in the restaurant and on the beach
The staff could not be more helpful and the hotel is in excellent condition and Unlimited access to Wild Wadi Waterpark
Stunning hotel with first class service

The seaview is second to none the Burj Al Arab is practically in touching distance and it really is the most breath taking view when you open the curtainsThe pools breakfast lunch and service by all staff was highly attentive and the best I have ever experienced
Beautiful hotel great family services and exceptional staff
The staff are very friendly especially chef David
Excellent Customer Service
Great Hotel Bad service
Level of quality and service has been maintained since our first visit in 202

we stayed in a club room it was awesome all new beautiful shower bath spotlessly clean Club lounge staff well I ca n’t mention them all but they all fantastic people and so helpful and friendly thank you
